Commands.Cross-Slash: 2-hit Melee BRV attack + HP attackTarget: Low chance Paralysis for 1 turn
Commands.Meteorain: 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + HP attackAttacks distributed based on number of enemiesHP damage sharedSelf: 4 turns Mako

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Debuff Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Mighty Cross-Slash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Cross-Slash by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Finishing Touch: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Finishing Touch by 10%.

Passives.Cross-Slash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Cross-Slash/+.
Passives.Cross-Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Cross-Slash/+.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Hard Hit: Grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Defense Down debuff to the target for 2 turns after an HP Attack.
Passives.Finishing Touch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Finishing Touch.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Finishing Touch Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after using Finishing Touch.
Passives.Cross-Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Cross-Slash by 1.
Passives.The Power of Mako: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Low BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises ATK when BRV is less than INT BRV
Passives.Cross-Slash Extension: When using Cross-Slash:•Slight BRV damage boost•Slight boost to BRV damage dealt with critical hit
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly increases ATK when attacking enemy targeting self
Passives.Finishing Touch Extension: When using Finishing Touch:•Slight BRV damage boost•Current buffs extended 1 turn (once only)
